Description: Ostracon, small fragment of the rim-section of a light-brown pottery bowl, the interior is elaborated with a red and brown painted leaf-motifs and bands on an off-white ground, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and faint traces of at least three lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394826) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394826)
